summary: After a devastating boat crash, a group of friends are stranded on an uncharted island where they encounter an ancient tribe of humanoid creatures.
cast: Emily Baldoni|Nick Mennell|Marc Bacher|Brianna Brown|Hadley Fraser|Maxine Bahns|Ryan Alosio|Lance Henriksen|Terry Notary|Peter David Parasiliti|Mohit Ramchandani|Joseph Anderson|Shane Brewer|Hugh Daly|Wil Daniels|Jody Hart|Adam John Kalma|Justin Mortelliti|Emno Rodriguez|M. Ryan Vazquez|Jason Whisman|Caleb Campbell|Daniel Case|Shane Denil|Michael A. Mendez
title: The Lost Tribe
